name: ColorDrift
description:
Color Drift is an addicting, color-based reaction game, in which the player taps circles that are the same color as the character in a test of reflexes and color perception.

Also available on iOS

Instructions: Tap the circle with the same color as your character, and don't let it fall below the screen

Music and sound effects by Devin Bews
Check out his music and performances at dbews.com!
